遮.definition: to cover up (a shortcoming); to screen off; to hide; to conceal

遮住.definition: to cover (up); to block; to obstruct; to shade

遮天蔽日.definition: lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering; omnipresent; of universal importance

遮掩.definition: to cover; to mask; to cover up or conceal (the truth etc)

遮斷.definition: to cut off; to interrupt; to prevent access

遮羞.definition: to cover up one's embarrassment; to hush up a scandal

遮蔽.definition: to cover; to hide from view; to obstruct or block; defilade (military)

遮遮掩掩.definition: to be secretive; to try to cover up (idiom)

遮風避雨.definition: to give shelter from the wind and rain; to keep out the elements
